message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable for the first round.
Let's try a 55/45 split, Alice. It's more than fair!
Bob, let's be realistic. I'll agree to a smaller share than last round, but 56/44 is my final offer.
Come on, Alice! 58/42 is more than generous. Don't be greedy!
Bob, we're running out of time!  52/48 is my compromise. Let's close this deal before inflation eats our profits!
